attributes.action: Nationalise private hospitals, including beds and staff, during this emergency .
attributes.additional_details: According to government we all need to help each other , we are all in this together .So it's incumbent on government to use all measures open to it.
attributes.background: During this emergency private hospitals will be needed and should be nationalised during this period to help to deal with this current emergency.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302610

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
